channel.title: How would I do this?
channel.description: My friends and I are creating a server based on teh economy... People have to make the items and/or sell to other so that they can have armor ands items. But i found it in the testing that you cant smith! It only turns the bars into gold. So I was woundering if by any chance anyone can tell me how I can make a shop where I can exchange bars (bronze bars, addy bars, rune bars) to get the items if they where smithing. I was kinda thinking of the same way the pest control works. How you need points to get items. My server is a 317 server. if anyone can help me. I will give them free admin on my server once its released! Thank you!

item.title: How would I do this?
item.dc:creator: @raymyn raymyn
item.description:
@raymyn wrote:

so does anyone have msn, that can help me out lol?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 29, 2009, 08:54:48 am[/size][hr]Well I have another source, but I always get errors when i try to combine the sources… Does anyone know exactly where the smithing stuff goes?
